amendment.description: Amendment states that educational requirements include instruction on fraud, consumer protection, and fair lending issues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 110-450 to state that educational requirements include instruction on fraud, consumer protection, and fair lending issues.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Green, Al.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
